title: Best spot for Jimmy G; Raiders overhyped or under-hyped? Baker's role  in Carolina; Steelers CB Levi Wallace
itunes:title: Best spot for Jimmy G; Raiders overhyped or under-hyped? Baker's role  in Carolina; Steelers CB Levi Wallace
description:
The Good Morning Football Podcast begins with a look around the league for the ideal spot for Jimmy Garoppolo. Hosts Will Selva, James Palmer, Mike Garafolo, and Super Bowl champion Shaun O’Hara explain why the Miami Dolphins, Houston Texans and the Cleveland Browns would be a good landing spot for Jimmy G and then the guys discuss if the Las Vegas Raiders are overhyped or under-hyped. Later, the GMFB crew answers how Baker Mayfield can be the starter in Carolina, who Justin Fields’ favorite target will be, and what Saints head coach Dennis Allen should be focusing on. The show finishes up being joined by Steelers CB Levi Wallace and he talks about filling the role of Joe Haden, why the Steelers could have the best defense in 2022, and how he expects his return to Buffalo to go.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
